precaution: Remove any items that you could knock off from the table.
instruction: Sit at the table with a bowl containing three colored spheres—yellow, red, and blue—, a towel, and a tong in front of you.
Pour the bowl of the spheres onto a towel placed on the table in front of you.
Grab the tongs with your right hand.
Rest your right arm on the table.
While your right arm is resting on the table, hold the tongs and grab the spheres one by one.
Place the spheres back into the bowl while ensuring that your arm remains in a gravity-reduced position.
Once all the spheres have been placed into the bowl, release the tongs.
